channel.title: Random sound static
channel.description: For some reason at random times the sound will suddenly have this static noise with it but as I play the game it would seem to go away but then come back...

item.title: Random sound static
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
I had that too, but only at some areas i.e the Gman speech with the scientist in AM.
I reinstalled the game, and done .

Read full topic

item.title: Random sound static
item.dc:creator: bublik
item.description:
BlackMesarulez98:

Does this static come up when you walk in or around green liquid radiation stuff because when you do, the HEV Suit starts its radiation geiger counter thingy which creates static on your screen. That should solve the problem.

I’m not sure but I don’t think so… It’s been happenning since the start of the game

Read full topic

item.title: Random sound static
item.dc:creator: BlackMesarulez98
item.description:
bublik:

For some reason at random times the sound will suddenly have this static noise with it but as I play the game it would seem to go away but then come back…

Does this static come up when you walk in or around green liquid radiation stuff because when you do, the HEV Suit starts its radiation geiger counter thingy which creates static on your screen. That should solve the problem.

Read full topic
